product_overview: Asaas is an offline-first ERP and Point-of-Sale web+desktop application built with React + Supabase, enabling fast local operations with background sync to Supabase for multi-workspace businesses.
core_goals: Provide a lightning-fast, offline-first Point-of-Sale experience that queues transactions locally and syncs when online.
Enable secure multi-workspace user access with role-based controls and Supabase-backed authentication.
Offer robust product and inventory management with local-first responsiveness and eventual consistency via a sync engine.
Deliver a unified UI across Web, Desktop (Tauri) and Android with consistent settings and workspace configuration.

features.name: User Login
features.description: Authenticate users with email and password via Supabase auth and establish an app session.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Login button to submit -> Receive authentication token and redirect to / -> See dashboard
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field with invalid@example.com -> Fill password input field with incorrect password -> Click Login button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Create a new user account using email/password and receive confirmation; new accounts are keyed to workspaces during onboarding.
user_flows: Navigate to /register -> Fill name input field -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Register button -> See email confirmation prompt and redirect to /login
Navigate to /register -> Fill name input field -> Fill email input field (existing email) -> Fill password input field -> Click Register button -> See error message 'email already in use'

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Show workspace overview metrics, charts and recent activity for authenticated users.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Authenticated session detected -> See dashboard metrics and charts
Navigate to / -> No authenticated session detected -> Redirect to /login

features.name: Point of Sale (POS)
features.description: Fast checkout interface optimized for barcode scanning and keyboard navigation; saves completed sales locally and syncs them to Supabase.
user_flows: Navigate to /pos -> Search product by name or SKU -> Select product from search results -> Adjust quantity -> Click Add to cart -> Click Checkout button -> Select payment method -> Click Complete Sale -> See receipt and sale saved locally
Navigate to /pos -> Scan barcode to add product -> Click Checkout button -> Select payment method -> Click Complete Sale -> App is offline -> See 'Sale queued for sync' notification

features.name: Product Management
features.description: CRUD interface for products and inventory items with local persistence and sync metadata for eventual consistency.
user_flows: Navigate to /products -> Click New Product button -> Fill product name input field -> Fill SKU input field -> Fill price input field -> Click Save product -> See product listed in product table
Navigate to /products -> Click New Product button -> Leave required fields empty -> Click Save product -> See validation error messages

features.name: Settings & Workspace Configuration
features.description: Manage workspace-level settings (currency, theme, feature flags) and admin controls; changes persist locally and are synced to Supabase.
user_flows: Navigate to /settings -> Modify workspace setting field (e.g., default_currency) -> Click Save settings -> See success toast and updated settings persisted
Navigate to /settings -> Modify admin-only setting as non-admin -> Click Save settings -> See permission denied error
